hero.title: Board of Governors
hero.intro: The BOG reviews the academic, extension, and financial budget activities and also issues directions for further strengthening.

metadata.title: Board of Governors | Shivalik College
metadata.description: Meet the advisory board steering academics, research, outreach, and financial stewardship at Shivalik College of Engineering.
